sentences.sContent: To become an Essene there was a period of preparation and purification that extended over three years.
sentences.sContent_eng: To become an Essene there was a period of preparation and purification that extended over three years.
sentences.sCn: 成为一个艾赛尼派教徒要准备很长时间和超过三年以上的净化时期。

sentences.sContent: I knew whisky is distilled. You say "pure", but what is the difference between purification and separation?
sentences.sContent_eng: I knew whisky is distilled. You say "pure", but what is the difference between purification and separation?
sentences.sCn: 我知道威士忌是蒸馏来的。你刚才说“纯”，提纯和分离有什么不同呢?。

sentences.sContent: This article introduces and discusses the purification of ordinary nitrogen by coarse titanium powder and its application in gas nitridation technology of titanium surface.
sentences.sContent_eng: This article introduces and discusses the purification of ordinary nitrogen by coarse titanium powder and its application in gas nitridation technology of titanium surface.
sentences.sCn: 介绍和讨论利用粗颗粒钛粉末净化普通氮气及其在钛表面气体氮化工艺中的应用。

phrases.pCn: 水净化器；水净化系统；纯水系统

remMethod.val: 来自purify(v. 净化； 使…纯净)

words.tran: [食品] 净化器；清洁者；精炼器；精炼者
使纯净；去除（purify的过去分词）；精炼
